title: Best Prime Day Mac deals July 2023
content:
Macworld

If you want to buy a new Mac one of the best times to get a bargain is during the Amazon Prime Day sale. Amazon’s Prime Day Sale is likely to take place in June or July 2023, and we expect to see Amazon drop the prices for the iMac, Mac mini and MacBooks even more than usual. Below you will find links to the different types of Macs available on Amazon – so it will be easy to find the best deals once the sale starts. You’ll also be able to see what kind of discounts Amazon offered when it held its early access sale in October 2022. Over Prime Day we will be tracking the sales, so be sure to check this page often as the deals change all the time.

If it’s a MacBook you are after, check out our separate round-up of the best Amazon Prime MacBook Air and MacBook Pro deals. We also have a round-up of all the Apple Amazon Prime Day deals.

Prime Day: How can I get the best Mac deals?

Amazon Prime Day is taking place between July 11 and 12 2023. Amazon also ran an Amazon Prime Early Access Sale between October 11 and 12 2022 nin the following countries: Austria, Australia, Belgium, Brazil, Canada, China, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, Luxembourg, Mexico, the Netherlands, Portugal, Singapore, Spain, the U.K., and the U.S.

Once Prime Day begins, most deals will be exclusive for Prime members, so you’ll need to sign in with an active membership to purchase one of the deals. Prime memberships cost $139 / £95 / AUD$59 annually, or $14.99 / £8.99 / AUD$6.99 on a monthly basis. New users can sign up for a 30-day free trial that can be canceled at any time during the trial window. As well as access to sales prices, Prime members also get free two-day shipping and access to Prime Video and all the content available on that service.
